comments.body:
It looks like this project contains a python entry point. Please add it here:

https://conda.io/docs/user-guide/tasks/build-packages/define-metadata.html#python-entry-points

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +14,18 @@  number: 0
  script: python setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record record.txt
  skip: True  # [py2k]
  entry_points:
    - pyweed = pyweed.pyweed_launcher:launch
